content: rib & garter stripe hat materials knitting worsted yarn about 55 grams main color - 31g color 2 - 12g color 3 - 12g us 8 5mm 16 circular needle us 8 5mm double-pointed needles dpn stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 18 stitches = 4 sample was knitted with loops & threads impeccable aran weight yarn finished measurement 19 in circumference 8 5 tall skill level easy without i-cord intermediate with i-cord instructions with main color black cast on 84 stitches place marker join being careful not to twist stitches rounds 1-7 knit with color 2 white round 8 knit rounds 9-12 k1 x p1 ribbing with main color black rounds 13-16 knit with color 3 red round 17 knit round 20 purl round 18 purl round 21 knit round 19 knit round 22 purl change to main color and repeat rounds 4-22 using same color changes hat will measure 5 5 - 6 before decrease decrease for crown with main color change to double-pointed needles as necessary round 1 *k10 k2tog repeat from * round 11 *k5 k2tog repeat from * rounds 2 4 6 8 10 knit round 12 *k4 k2tog repeat from * round 3 *k9 k2tog repeat from * round 13 *k3 k2tog repeat from * round 5 *k8 k2tog repeat from * round 14 *k2 k2tog repeat from * round 7 *k7 k2tog repeat from * round 15 *k1 k2tog repeat from * round 9 *k6 k2tog repeat from * round 16 *k2tog repeat from * if you are making i-cords at top of hat do one more k2tog 6 stitches remaining and leave those 6 stitches on two double-pointed needles cut yarn leaving tail long enough to run through remaining stitches secure inside hat weave in all ends inside hat optional i-cords on top of hat how to knit an i-cord - fiberfluxblog com after round 16 there will be 7 stitches on the needles do one more k2tog for 6 stitches remaining do not take the needles out of the last 6 stitches after running yarn through them and securing inside hat using color 2 on 3 of the stitches on one dpn start making a 3 stitch i-cord for 3 bind off cut yarn leaving a 3 tail with a darning needle run the end of yarn back through the i-cord and secure on the inside of the hat using color 3 on the 3 stitches on the other dpn make second i-cord as instructed above tie the two i-cords together at the top of the hat
